snippet.title: Lloyd the Monkey 3: New Worlds Showcase #Lloyd3
snippet.description:
Take a break from the heat with a new preview of Lloyd the Monkey 3, showing off the two additional levels that will be present at this year's SAGE Expo demo, Titan (Lloyd) and Ragna (Lura).

The demo will go live as part of SAGE on September 2, 2022 but if you want to try beta builds early, consider subscribing to our Patreon at patreon.com/MeyerGames.

#Lloyd3 #unity
